00001 import wx
00002 
00003 class FeedbackPanel(wx.Panel):
00004 
00005     def __init__(self, parent, id, size = None):
00006         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent = parent, size = size, style = wx.SIMPLE_BORDER)
00007 
00008         self.parent = parent
00009         self.id = id
00010 
00011         sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00012 
00013         # Feedback buttons, we get the labels from the parent panel
00014         try:
00015             feedback_option = self.parent.feedback_option
00016             feedback_sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.HORIZONTAL)
00017             button_list = []
00018             for option in feedback_option:
00019                 button = wx.Button(self, -1, option)
00020                 button.SetName(option)
00021                 feedback_sizer.Add(button)
00022                 self.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.onFeedback, button)
00023                 button_list.append(button)
00024             sizer.Add(feedback_sizer)
00025             self.button_list = button_list
00026 
00027         except:
00028             print 'no feedback on parent panel'
00029 
00030         sizer.AddSpacer((10,10))
00031 
00032         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00033         sizer.Add(self.sizer)
00034 
00035         self.Layout()
00036         self.SetSizer(sizer)
00037 
00038 
00039 #------------------------------------------#
00040     def unselectAll(self):
00041         for button in self.button_list:
00042             button.SetBackgroundColour(wx.NullColour)
00043 
00044 #------------------------------------------#
00045     def unselect(self, button_index):
00046         self.button_list[button_index].SetBackgroundColour(wx.NullColour)
00047 
00048 #------------------------------------------#
00049     def onFeedback(self, event):
00050         '''
00051         Tell parent that I've been selected.
00052         Let my parent keep track of whose been selected for what.
00053         '''
00054         button = event.GetEventObject()
00055         button.SetBackgroundColour('GREEN')
00056         self.parent.onFeedback(button, self)
00057
